column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------ More than 300 men and women
column5: are still being held outside Phnom Penh police station after the raid on Rock Entertainment Center on the night of the 23rd
column6: February.------Latest reports say the quantity of drugs seized has now gone up to over 50 kilograms. ------ Deputy Prosecutor Ly Sophanana said “Diagnostic drugs testing of more than 300 young men are running at the Phnom Penh police station
column7: and most have been found to be drug users.”------Authorities are busy doing this work
column8: and a press conferences will be held when it is completed. ------https://tvfb.news/article/18661
